meanings.definition: Brawest: superlative form of braw, meaning excellent or fine.
meanings.sent1: She wore the brawest dress to the party, everyone admired it.
meanings.sent2: The brawest sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: His brawest dance move made everyone laugh and cheer.
meanings.sent4: The brawest flower in the garden stood out like a queen among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The brawest moment of the play was when the hero saved the day.
